column1: Fonte Nuova is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Rome in the Italian region Lazio
column2: located about 15 kilometres (9 mi) northeast of Rome.

column1: The comune was created in 2001 from the frazioni of Tor Lupara di Mentana and Santa Lucia di Mentana
column3: and that of Tor Lupara of Guidonia Montecelio.
